thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com | 9 of 1372
thread.title: Mathews

author: Mathews
title: Mathews
text:
This is a review that is being done BEFORE I have received the product(s)
TrustPilot popped up wanting a review as I placed the order... so here goes - The 1000Bulbs.com site was easy to navigate, and allowed me to find, in fine detail, the various bulbs that I was looking for. I've grown tired of bulbs burning out after two months, or sometimes less. These bulbs that I ordered are rated to last longer - one of them 10,000 hours. I will wait for delivery and write then of part 2 (how accurate and efficient delivery) - in the next.
